text: Mauro Mongiardo is an electrical engineer at the University of Perugia, Italy. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his contributions to the modal analysis of complex electromagnetic structures. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:University of Perugia faculty Category:Italian engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mauro Mongiardo
